abstract: The movie and its hit soundtrack contributed to a 27 percent increase in net income for the company’s second fiscal quarter.
snippet: The movie and its hit soundtrack contributed to a 27 percent increase in net income for the company’s second fiscal quarter.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — The stunning success of “Frozen,” surging theme park spending, strong merchandise sales and higher fees for ESPN combined to deliver quarterly results for the Walt Disney Company that were nothing short of spectacular.

headline.main: ‘Frozen’ Helps Lift Profit for an Energized Disney
headline.print_headline: ‘Frozen’ Helps Lift Profit for an Energized Disney
